chapter.title: Do I know you? - Indexing
chapter.para: Then there was an @Indexed annotation for fields. I wanted to try this too. That would guide the next test. I added an @Indexed to the id field of the movie. This field is intended to represent the external id that will be used in URIs and will stable over database imports and updates. This time I went with the Finder to retrieve my indexed movie.
